critique: This document is an executive order providing an exception to civil service rules for a specific individual, Mrs. Thelma D. Roy, to be employed in the Treasury Department for one year. It explicitly states that this exception does not confer any status for subsequent employment. The rationale is based on her prior temporary employment and her current situation as a deserted mother with three children to support. There is no clear indication of broad ideological leaning, immigration policy, executive power expansion, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion/exclusion. The order seems to be a specific, compassionate exception based on individual circumstances.
